== Books - for members of the group ==
=== O'Reilly ===

O'Reilly is very supportive of local user groups. We should put in a request for some books. Lets get our learn on.

* http://ug.oreilly.com/register.csp

Suggestions-

* bash Pocket Reference http://oreilly.com/catalog/0636920010166/ 

* The Linux Programming Interface http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781593272203/

Finn would like (in order of priority):

* <nowiki>[[http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781593272883/|Metasploit]]</nowiki>

* one of their books on Asterisk (like <nowiki>[[http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596517342/|this one]]</nowiki>)

* <nowiki>[[http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781449388348/|Mining the Social Web]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[http://oreilly.com/catalog/9780596522728/|Programming Google App Engine]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[http://oreilly.com/catalog/9781593271923/|Gray Hat Python]]</nowiki>
